de.braintags.io.vertx.pojomapper.mapping.datastore

Interface IColumnHandler


  • public interface IColumnHandler
    The IColumnHandler is used to generate and update columns inside the connected datastore and to read structural information about the columns from there.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static short MATCH_MAJOR
      Returned by method matches(IField) to specify that the current columnhandler handles the given field in a major way.
      static short MATCH_MINOR
      Returned by method matches(IField) to specify that the current columnhandler handles the given field in a minor way.
      static short MATCH_NONE
      Returned by method matches(IField) to specify that the current columnhandler won't handle the given field

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.Object generate(IField field)
      This method generates the command, which is used to create a column in the connected datastore
      boolean isColumnModified(IColumnInfo plannedCi, IColumnInfo existingCi)
      Method checks, wether the IColumnInfo plannedCi has some modifications to be done in comparison to existingCi.
      short matches(IField field)
      Checks wether the given IField is matching the criteria in the current instance.

      • MATCH_NONE

        static final short MATCH_NONE
        Returned by method matches(IField) to specify that the current columnhandler won't handle the given field

      • MATCH_MINOR

        static final short MATCH_MINOR
        Returned by method matches(IField) to specify that the current columnhandler handles the given field in a minor way. For instance, if the class of the field is not direct the class, which the typehandler deals with, but an instance of
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • MATCH_MAJOR

        static final short MATCH_MAJOR
        Returned by method matches(IField) to specify that the current columnhandler handles the given field in a major way. For instance, if the class of the field is the direct class
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • matches

        short matches(IField field)
        Checks wether the given IField is matching the criteria in the current instance. The method returns a graded result, one of MATCH_NONE, MATCH_MINOR or MATCH_MAJOR
        Parameters:
        field - the field to be checked
        Returns:
        0 ( zero ) if the Typ

      • generate

        java.lang.Object generate(IField field)
        This method generates the command, which is used to create a column in the connected datastore
        Parameters:
        field - the field which shall be generated in the datastore
        Returns:
        the creation object, like a column creation string

      • isColumnModified

        boolean isColumnModified(IColumnInfo plannedCi,
                         IColumnInfo existingCi)
        Method checks, wether the IColumnInfo plannedCi has some modifications to be done in comparison to existingCi. This action is performed by an IColumnHander, cause the check will respect different properties when checking a Text field or a numeric field for instance
        Parameters:
        plannedCi - the planned IColumnInfo, which is coming out of an IMapper
        existingCi - the existing IColumnInfo typically read from a datastore
        Returns:
        true, if the plannedCi is changed in comparison to the existingCi
